about_the_game:
Life in Helmsfirth has been pretty good, up until recently. You've been promoted to be the lead mage, reporting directly to the Mayor. Defense and security of Helmsfirth are your responsibility, which you had thought would be a piece of cake, in this peaceful, sleepy town.
At least, it used to be peaceful.
About a month ago, people began disappearing at night, with no clues as to where they went.
You're the last defense for the people of Helmsfirth against an evil that is picking them off, one by one. Use your magic and detective skills to unravel the mystery and defeat the monster lurking in the woods. But be careful who you trust - the fate of the town, and your own life, depends on it.

Features:

  • Over 9 unique main character routes to explore
  • Choices will have consequences
  • Unlock bonus scenes and new routes
  • Eerie original soundtrack

content_descriptors.notes:
Game includes written descriptions of violence, injury, and murder. No visual display blood or gore.
Some of the stories include unhealthy relationship interactions which may be disturbing to some viewers.
The game has a suspenseful and creepy setting.

short_description: Horrors of Helmsfirth is a horror/adventure visual novella where you investigate the mystery causing townsfolk to disappear at night. Build trust with allies who can help save your town from monsters. Explore 9 different character plot lines and defeat the forces of evil… or join them?
